experience.description: Developed complex Web Applications as Network Observability tools with microservices architecture using the MERN stack. The applications leveraged Docker containerization, NGINX reverse-proxy and are deployed to AWS utilising various services like ECS, ECR, ALB, DocumentDB, Route53 and CloudWatch with Bamboo as our CI/CD driver coupled with BitBucket.
Contracted to work with a skilled, growing IT team providing fully managed IT services and support for 130+ clients across Australia.
Contracted through the Australian Computer Society scholarship program, I worked as part of a small motivated IT team, servicing and managing 23+ sites across 26 companies in Western Australia.

Worked in a small team of three providing designs, engineering calculations, computerized drawings and quantified materials for scaffolding projects both on-shore and off-shore with guidance from the Design Manager.
